articles.author: Aarian Marshall
articles.title: Feds putting the kibosh on national EV charging program - Ars Technica
articles.description: The US government has ordered states to retract their plans to build hundreds of federally funded EV charging stations, according to a memo obtained by WIRED.
articles.content: The US Department of Transportation has ordered states to kill their implementation plans related to the National Electric Vehicle Infrastructure program, according to a memo obtained by WIRED that w… [+3953 chars]

articles.title: Inside the lovefest between Palantir and its army of retail investors - Business Insider
articles.description: Retail investors have shown particularly strong feelings for Palantir and its CEO, Alex Karp. The tech firm has leaned into that fandom in recent years.
articles.content:
For Katherine H., a 60-year-old personal chef, the recent surge in Palantir stock has been a "godsend."

articles.author: Ryan Christoffel
articles.title: Apple’s newest iPhone feature will likely fly under the radar next week - 9to5Mac
articles.description: iPhone SE 4 launches soon, and like previous models, almost none of its tech is new. Except one feature that’s likely to fly under the radar.
articles.content: Apple is expected to announce its new iPhone SE next week, and the feature list looks compelling. But like previous SE models, almost all of the new iPhones tech has been seen before. Except for one … [+2935 chars]
